item.title: Ike Kligerman Barkley
item.dc:creator: artomatt
item.description:
A minimal gridded website for a New York and San Francisco architecture firm. The site layout was based around the horizontal half way point to give the brand designed by Commune, a strong impact.

The post Ike Kligerman Barkley appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
item.content:encoded:
A minimal gridded website for a New York and San Francisco architecture firm. The site layout was based around the horizontal half way point to give the brand designed by Commune, a strong impact.

The post Ike Kligerman Barkley appeared first on Matthew Gordils.

item.title: Commune
item.dc:creator: Matthew Gordils
item.description:
Commune is a design collective that spans interior design, graphic design and web design to assemble the best team for each project.

item.title: Honor
item.dc:creator: Matthew Gordils
item.description:
An ecommerce website for Honor, a high-end women’s fashion brand. The branding was created by RoAndCo. The site design and development was created at NoFavorite in Collaboration with High Tide Creative.

The post Honor appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
item.content:encoded:
An ecommerce website for Honor, a high-end women’s fashion brand. The branding was created by RoAndCo. The site design and development was created at NoFavorite in Collaboration with High Tide Creative.

The post Honor appeared first on Matthew Gordils.

item.title: Totally Organic
item.dc:creator: artomatt
item.description:
Totally Organic is a orange juice packaging created for Trader Joes. The juice comes in a carton or a frozen concentrate. For the look of the packaging I played off of botanical drawings and retro fruit patterns.

The post Totally Organic appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
item.content:encoded:
Totally Organic is a orange juice packaging created for Trader Joes. The juice comes in a carton or a frozen concentrate. For the look of the packaging I played off of botanical drawings and retro fruit patterns.

The post Totally Organic appeared first on Matthew Gordils.

item.title: State Fair
item.dc:creator: artomatt
item.description:
Packaging for a series of preserves that would be sold at a State Fair. Each of the three would be sold at a different state’s fair. Florida sells its state’s juicy orange preserves, Washington has its crisp apple preserves, and Georgia sells its states delicious peach preserves. The style for these labels play off of old […]

The post State Fair appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
item.content:encoded:
Packaging for a series of preserves that would be sold at a State Fair. Each of the three would be sold at a different state’s fair. Florida sells its state’s juicy orange preserves, Washington has its crisp apple preserves, and Georgia sells its states delicious peach preserves. The style for these labels play off of old fruit crate labels. The containers are the real jars used to preserve the fruits.

The post State Fair appeared first on Matthew Gordils.

item.title: Southpaw Circus
item.dc:creator: artomatt
item.description:
The Southpaw Circus is a fictional event featuring animal boxing between some of the most ferocious contenders. The champion is crowned with the title the King of the Jungle. The project included a logo mark, poster series and collection of trading cards featuring the fierce competitors. The cards also included fighter information and the history […]

The post Southpaw Circus appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
item.content:encoded:
The Southpaw Circus is a fictional event featuring animal boxing between some of the most ferocious contenders. The champion is crowned with the title the King of the Jungle. The project included a logo mark, poster series and collection of trading cards featuring the fierce competitors. The cards also included fighter information and the history of the event. The Southpaw Circus posters and trading cards showcase a hand drawn script inspired by from 1920’s boxing posters.

The post Southpaw Circus appeared first on Matthew Gordils.
